page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICK
page.content: My day begins at about 7:25am.I lie in bed wondering what lessons I have and pray I have finished all my home- work.I look out of the window and judge what to wear.When dressed I go down for breakfast.I have a game of pool or watch T.V depending on my mood. I leave home at 9:00am and get to school four minutes later.Registration goes on till ten past nine.After that there are two 50 minute lessons then a 20 minute break.There are then two more lessons before our lunch break of an hour.I go home.In the afternoon there are 2 more lessons and school ends at 3:35pm.When I get home I make a cup of tea,feed the cat,and play pool.I will then ring a friend and we go and play football on the astroturf or roam the area on our bikes.Later I complete my homework,have supper and go to bed.
